instruction: Amlodipine – patient states they take it for blood pressure but sometimes miss refills/pick-ups.
Provider advised patient to set phone reminders and/or use a pill organizer consistently to improve adherence to amlodipine and to monitor for ankle/foot swelling as a possible side effect.

attributes.comment: Set phone reminders and/or use a pill organizer consistently to improve adherence to amlodipine, and monitor for ankle/foot swelling as a possible side effect.

instruction: Patient lives alone and reports difficulty consistently taking amlodipine, occasionally forgetting to pick up refills; denies ankle or foot swelling but reports increased fatigue; days ‘blend together’ impacting medication adherence.

attributes.narrative: Patient lives alone, struggles with consistent amlodipine use—often forgets to take doses and sometimes misses refill pickups. Denies ankle or foot swelling, but notes increased fatigue. States that days ‘blend together,’ contributing to poor medication adherence.
